main event: Two bright white objects were sighted in the sky over Phoenix, Arizona on November 29, 1955.
interesting points: The objects initially appeared as two sets of navigation lights that remained stationary with respect to each other., The sighting lasted for about 10 to 15 seconds., The objects ascended like rockets and melted together into one large lighted area before vanishing., The observer had experience in aircraft identification and astronomy., No sound was evident during the sighting.
sighted object: two bright white lights in the sky
witness description: An observer with experience in aircraft identification and astronomy.
